mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, m.nickname as author FROM article a inner join member m on a.memberId = m.id ORDER BY a.id DESC
SELECT a.*, m.nickname as author FROM article a inner join member m on a.memberId = m.id where a.boardId=#{boardId} ORDER BY a.id DESC
SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS author FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id}
